channel.description: The latest CVEs for GamiPress -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-24000|2024-09-06T18:03:33.674Z -- gamipress -- gamipress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in GamiPress gamipress allows SQL Injection.This issue affects GamiPress: from n/a through 2.5.7.
